images.caption: Figure 1.Mixture of Global and Local Experts with Diffusion Transformer(Face-MoGLE) is a unified and flexible framework for high-quality and controllable face generation. It supports text-to-face synthesis (left), mask-to-face synthesis (right), and multimodal face generation guided jointly by text and masks (middle). By harmonizing global context modeling with local detail refinement, Face-MoGLE produces highly photorealistic results with enhanced semantic consistency and visual fidelity.
